title: The Art of Navigating University Stress.
description: University life is an exhilarating journey, but it often comes with its fair share of academic stress and emotional ups and downs. As a uni student, you're not alone in experiencing these blues. In fact, it's all part of the ...
text:
In today's digital age, university life is increasingly intertwined with screens. While technology offers numerous advantages, excessive screen time can affect mental health negatively. Let's explore this impact and discuss strategies for balance. 

The constant use of screens, including online classes, social media, and entertainment, can lead to issues such as anxiety, depression, sleep disturbances, and reduced attention spans among university students. 

Always remember: seeking support is a sign of strength. Reach out to peers or campus services during challenges; you can successfully navigate the highs and lows of university life with the right approach.
